doc:
Ernie Wise https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernie_Wise 0 Ernest Wiseman, (27 November 1925 – 21 March 1999), known by his stage name Ernie Wise, was an English comedian, best known as one half of the comedy duo Morecambe and Wise, who became a national institution on British television, especially for their Christmas specials. Ernest_Wiseman , ( 27_November_1925 – 21_March_1999 ) , known by his_stage_name_Ernie_Wise , was an_English_comedian , best_known as one_half of the_comedy_duo_Morecambe_and_Wise , who became a_national_institution on British_television , especially for their_Christmas_specials .
